channel.title: Mage In MoparScape?
channel.description:
I have the client and everything, but how do I make my self able to use Magic?? and Ancient Magicks?? Any codes? Places to go? Remember, this is just MoparScape client :-)
Thanks :-)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 10, 2006, 12:24:47 PM[/size][hr]Oh yeah, and if it's no trouble, how do i download from megaupload??

item.title: Mage In MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @neverlost neverlost
item.description:
@neverlost wrote:

First, if your server doesn’t have the magic’s added in then you need to do so, if there still not working then you need to get a client. And the megaupload thing is in the wrong section.

Read full topic
